definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
in the dark/in secret/on the sly/surreptitiously

sentences.english: And the children of Amram； Aaron， and Moses， and Miriam.
sentences.chinese: 暗蘭的兒子是亞倫，摩西，還有女兒米利暗。

sentences.english: Also, it would be best to stick with darker stripes, because contrasting colors add more depth.
sentences.chinese: 暗條紋也是個絕佳之選，因爲對比色會增加視覺深度。

sentences.english: Dark launches are usually done two weeks before the actual launch.
sentences.chinese: 暗啓動通常是在正式發動前兩個星期。

sentences.english: Unfortunately the photo is a bit dark, so cannot see the reception clearly.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸像片拍得有些暗，所以看不清前臺。

sentences.english: We'll also make the dark parts of the clouds on the left stronger.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們要把左邊的暗處弄得更暗一些。

sentences.english: It is the sky -blue , in a less than half dark darkness, revolving star.
sentences.chinese: 它是蔚藍色的，一小半暗的黑暗裏，旋轉的星球。

sentences.english: Du Du's bright mahogany eyes fade when he mentions them.
sentences.chinese: 當他提到他們時，杜杜那雙明亮熱情的雙眼暗了下去。

sentences.english: The dark reaction take place in the stroma.
sentences.chinese: 暗反映階段發生在基質中。

sentences.english: The room is nice except for the dark color at the coner.
sentences.chinese: 整個房間很漂亮，除了角落的顏色暗。

sentences.english: The walls of the workrooms were a dull gray color.
sentences.chinese: 工場間的牆壁全是一片暗灰色。

sentences.english: Dark bar for himself to touch all four pieces of the same brand.
sentences.chinese: 暗槓則爲自己摸到全部四張同樣的牌。

sentences.english: The night is dark, even the stars appear without light.
sentences.chinese: 夜更暗了，連星星都顯得無光。

sentences.english: Palace maid dark cry, but looking back on the sand pedestrians.
sentences.chinese: 漢宮侍女暗垂淚，沙上行人卻回首。

sentences.english: Basilisks' hides range from dark chestnut shades of brown to mossy green and ocean blue.
sentences.chinese: 蜥怪的皮從暗板栗色，暗棕色，到苔蘚綠與海藍都有。

definition: color of the sky/time of day, as indicated by the color of the sky/weather
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
